title: Crownpeak Digital Quality Management (DQM)
creator: Crownpeak
description: Enterprise-grade accessibility and digital governance platform, designed to ensure ADA, WCAG 2.1, and section 508 compliance across global web estates. Accessibility errors are flagged, and issues are highlighted on each page for guided remediation.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
